titles.title: A bill to provide a temporary increase in the maximum loan guaranty amount for certain housing loans guaranteed by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 3/14/2008 S2150)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. (text of measure as introduced: CR 3/14/2008 S2150-2151)

bill.summary:
3/13/2008--Introduced.
Provides a temporary increase, during the period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act and ending on December 31, 2011, in the maximum veterans' loan guaranty amount for housing loans guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA).
